p.d: Claire reveals to Alice that Sandra was driving the car that killed Simon. Claire had previously told Alice and Fabio that she was the guilty party, and had asked the latter to cover her. At the police station, William is remanded in custody for Anthony's murder. It's now Blandine who is blackmailing Claire, demanding a huge sum of money in exchange for her silence. On the spot where her sister was murdered, Alice finds a small mother-of-pearl pendant. Later, in the car with her mother, Claire suffers from violent muscle spasms and the vehicle ends up in a ditch... Directed by: Marwen Abdallah (France, 2018) Screenplay: Jeanne Le Guillou, Bruno Dega Cast: Alexia Barlier (Alice), Cristiana Reali (Claire), Lannick Gautry (Vincent), Patrick Catalifo (Guy), Alexandra Vandernoot (Géraldine), Stéphane Freiss (Étienne), Constance Labbé (Camille), Guillaume Duhesme (William), David BaIot (Benjamin), Stefan Godin (Pierre), Sophie de La Rochefoucauld (Cathy), Selma Kouchy (Yasmina), Joyce Bibring (Sandra), Laurent Fernandez (Marc), Thomas Drelon (Fabio), Claire-Lise Lecerf (Blandine), Julien Faure (Fabien), François Sciolla (Anthony), Romain Paul (Simon) Genre: drama
